title: Luke and Holly Join Forces
description: Finally reunited Luke and Holly learn of a plot to attack the House of their Great Uncle. With their friends Jamie and Jemimah, they fight and win the Battle of the Serpentine and defeat the attackers. The Hyde Park Squirrels series is set in Victorian times and follows the adventures of two Squirrels called Luke and Holly (brother and sister) who were separated when they were babies .
author: Nick Croydon
